item.title: Make skillcapes. u need 99 to weild them?
item.dc:creator: @sonsofgod2 sonsofgod2
item.description:
@sonsofgod2 wrote:

public String getItemName(int ItemID) { for (int i = 0; i < server.itemHandler.MaxListedItems; i++) { if (server.itemHandler.ItemList[i] != null) { if (server.itemHandler.ItemList[i].itemId == ItemID) { return server.itemHandler.ItemList[i].itemName; } } } return "!!! ITEM NOT FULLY ADDED !!! - ID:" + ItemID; }

were do i add that in client.java cuz were i put it gave me errors

item.title: Make skillcapes. u need 99 to weild them?
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

Uhm, okay open up client.java

make sure you have this in your client.java

       public String getItemName(int ItemID) {
                for (int i = 0; i < server.itemHandler.MaxListedItems; i++) {
                        if (server.itemHandler.ItemList[i] != null) {
                                if (server.itemHandler.ItemList[i].itemId == ItemID) {
                                        return server.itemHandler.ItemList[i].itemName;
                                }
                        }
                }
                return "!!! ITEM NOT FULLY ADDED !!! - ID:" + ItemID;
        }

next search for this

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

Lets say 1 is your defence skillcape code and the requirement to wear is 99.

if (wearID == 1 && playerLevel[0] < 99) { CAM().sendMessage("You need an defence level of 99 to wear the defence skillcape.); return false; }

By the way, i know how to do this but i searched it up. and the author is john459
